RunningTaskInfoProxy * mpProxy

Detailed Description

Information you can retrieve about tasks that the user has most recently started or visited.

Please check example sdk/example/PageManagerTest for more information 

 mCT = new Context(this);
 mPM = new PageManager(mCT);
 RunningTaskInfoArray array = mPM->getRunningTasks(NUM_RUNNING_TASKS);

Member Function Documentation

ComponentName gaia::core::RunningTaskInfo::getBasePage ( )

The component launched as the first page in the task.

This can be considered the "application" of this task.

graphics::Bitmap* gaia::core::RunningTaskInfo::getThumbnailN ( )

Thumbnail representation of the task's current state.

Currently always NULL.

ComponentName gaia::core::RunningTaskInfo::getTopPage ( )

The page component at the top of the history stack of the task.

This is what the user is currently doing.
